_header: The twelfth day from Christs birth
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 6387.
Subjects: Epiphany, feast of; sermon texts, Gospel
_description: Gospel for Epiphany in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
The twelft daye fra cristis birtheBiddes cristen men make ioye
                    & myrthe…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesu criste vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þider vs lede . Amen .

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞE twelfþe day from cristes burþeCristen men make
                    muche murþe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penaunce and þider vs
                    lede AMEN
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Cum natus esset Ihesu in Bethleem Iude (f.
                    173vc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
þE tuelft day fro cristes birtheBurd cristen men make ioy
                    & myrthe…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesu crist vs spedeTil do penaunce &
                    þedire vs lede
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title: In epiphania domini Euangelium secundum mathium (p. 47)

CULDd11.First Lines:
On þe twelf day fro cristis birthecristen men make moche
                    mirthe…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Oure lord ihesu crist vs spedeto don penauns & þedir
                    vs lede
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Cum natus esset ihesus in Bethleem inde in diebus herodis regis ecce
                        magi et cetera (f. 60v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
The twelfe day fra cristes berthByddys cristen men make ioy and
                    merth…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lord ihesu criste vs spedeTo do penance and þeder
                    vs lede
CULGg531.Attributed Title: In die Epiphanie domini secundum Matheum (f. 32)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
The tuelfte day fra cristes birthWill crysten men make ioy &
                    myrth…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…And at Ihesu vs sa spedeTo do penaunces and þithir vs
                    lede

EDCPCM.First Lines:
þe tuelft dai fra cristes birtheBides cristen men mak ioy and
                        myrþe…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Our lauerd iesus crist us redeTo do penans and þider us
                    lede
EDCPCM.Note: Last word of second line erased.

Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….
         Edinburgh: W. Paterson, 1862: 94-106.
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
The twlfe day fra crystes byrthbyddes crysten men make Ioy &
                    mirȝth…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihe ihesu cryst vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þidyr vs lede

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þe twolft day fro crist is byrthByddyt cristynmen mak ioy and
                    myrth…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd ihesu crist vs spedTo do penauns and þeddyr
                    vs led
